project.description: The name of the frontend project to test

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting).

specs.description: Define which test specs should run. The pattern is relative to the directory of the configuration file being run.

exclude.description: Exclude spec file(s) from a run.

maxInstances.description: maxInstances handles how many capabilities from the same test should run tests.

maxInstancesPerCapability.description: maxInstancesPerCapability sets a limit to run tests with a specific capability

browsers.description: A list of browsers (capabilities) you like to run your tests on.

outputDir.description: The output directory for the logs, relative to the root configuration of your project.

bail.description: If you only want to run your tests until a specific amount of tests have failed use bail (default is 0 - don't bail, run all tests).

baseUrl.description: The address (with the port) which your application is running on.

waitforTimeout.description: Default timeout for all waitForXXX commands.

framework.description: Framework you want to run your specs with.

protocol.description: The automation protocol to use with WebdriverIO

specFileRetries.description: The number of times to retry the entire specfile when it fails.
